sources.note: Main website; heavily JS-rendered so limited content extractable. Identifies Axiom as 'Leading EHR Software for Behavioral Health'.

March 2024 press release announcing AI-powered AxiomEHR. Details AI features, pilot results (2hrs/day savings, 23% more accurate billing codes), product modules, and ChangePoint Integrated Health as customer.

Third-party EHR directory listing. Details cloud-based deployment, behavioral health focus, key features including EVV, foster care/DD support, telehealth, e-prescribing, labs. Notes target of 11+ physician practices.

Software listing with pricing ($50/user/month for 1-10 users, $30/user for 100-1000). Lists target users: behavioral health clinics, addiction treatment, foster care, FQHCs. Notes MedTech Breakthrough Award.
Capterra listing for Axiom EHR. Page returned 403; limited information available from search snippet showing verified reviews exist.
GPEC (Greater Phoenix Economic Council) profile. Company background: Phoenix and Tucson offices, cloud-based architecture, 100% customer retention in 2019, rapid COVID-19 telehealth deployment.
Company profile. Founded 2014 by Khalid Al-Maskari, former IT consultant for behavioral health org. Subscription model, bi-monthly updates, custom form builder as differentiator.

Healthcare IT News article about COPE Community Services (Tucson). Details Axiom's cloud-based code updates, Zoom telehealth integration, automated billing from telehealth sessions, HCPCS/CPT code management.
SAM (Service Access & Management) case study PDF. Could not extract content (binary PDF). SAM implemented Axiom in 2022 with role-based customization.
Axiom EHR product page. Heavily JS-rendered; content not extractable via fetch.
FQHC-specific product page. Heavily JS-rendered; content not extractable via fetch.
AxiomMobile product page (from search results). HIPAA-compliant mobile clinician app for iOS/Android.
Company milestones page (from search results). MyHealtheHome Patient Portal launched 2017, now Axiom Connect.
AxiomEHR earned 2024 Merit Award for Healthcare.
Alternate vendor domain (hmsfirst.com). Returned 404 â€” appears to redirect to axiomehr.com.
